TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Sensor extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: Class representing a sensor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int javaReference, valuetype Android.Runtime.JniHandleOwnership transfer) cil managed

Docs.param: A containing a Java Native Interface (JNI) object reference.
Docs.summary: A constructor used when creating managed representations of JNI objects; called by the runtime.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.value: Maximum number of events of this sensor that could be batched. If this value is zero it indicates that batch mode is not supported for this sensor. If other applications registered to batched sensors, the actual number of events that can be batched might be smaller because the hardware FiFo will be partially used to batch the other sensors.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.value: Number of events reserved for this sensor in the batch mode FIFO. This gives a guarantee on the minimum number of events that can be batched.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Get the highest supported direct report mode rate level of the sensor.
Docs.value: Highest direct report rate level of this sensor. If the sensor does not support direct report mode, this returns .

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: To be added.
Docs.value: The sensor id that will be unique for the same app unless the device is factory reset. Return value of 0 means this sensor does not support this function; return value of -1 means this sensor can be uniquely identified in system by combination of its type and name.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns true if the sensor supports sensor additional information API
Docs.value: true if the sensor supports sensor additional information API

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsDirectChannelTypeSupported(valuetype Android.Hardware.SensorDirectChannelType sharedMemType) cil managed
abstract member IsDirectChannelTypeSupported : Android.Hardware.SensorDirectChannelType -> bool override this.IsDirectChannelTypeSupported : Android.Hardware.SensorDirectChannelType -> bool

Docs.param: type of shared memory used by direct channel.
Docs.summary: Test if a sensor supports a specified direct channel type.
Docs.returns: true if the specified shared memory type is supported.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns true if the sensor is a dynamic sensor.
Docs.value: true if the sensor is a dynamic sensor (sensor added at runtime).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns true if the sensor is a wake-up sensor.
Docs.value: true if this is a wake-up sensor, false otherwise.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: To be added.
Docs.value: To be added.

Docs.summary: This value is defined only for continuous and on-change sensors.
Docs.value: The max delay for this sensor in microseconds.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.value: maximum range of the sensor in the sensor's unit.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.value: the minimum delay allowed between two events in microsecond or zero if this sensor only returns a value when the data it's measuring changes.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.value: the power in mA used by this sensor while in use

Docs.summary: Each sensor has exactly one reporting mode associated with it.
Docs.value: Reporting mode for the input sensor, one of REPORTING_MODE_* constants.
